00028 Constraint ConstraintED2 = {
00029   val : 0.0,
00030   label : "sD2",
00031   me : calcConstraintED2,
00032   gradme : calcgradConstraintED2,
00033   output : outputConstraintED2
00034 };

00036 
00037 typedef struct {
00038   double Xcm[3];
00039   double d[3];
00040 } dipolepara;
00041 
00042 
00043 static void ob_edipole(const double* Xcm,
00044                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00045                        const GaussianAux* X, 
00046                        complex double d[3])
00047 {
00048   int i;
00049 
00050   if (G1->xi == 1)
00051     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00052       d[i] += (X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])* X->Q;
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 static void gob_edipole(const dipolepara* d2par,
00057                         const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00058                         const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00059                         complex double* ed2, gradGaussian* ded2)
00060 {
00061   double* Xcm = d2par->Xcm;
00062   double* d = d2par->d;
00063   int i, k;
00064   complex double med;
00065 
00066   if (G1->xi == 1)
00067     for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00068       med = X->rho[i]-Xcm[i];
00069 
00070       *ed2 += d[i]* med* X->Q;
00071 
00072       for (k=0; k<2; k++) 
00073         ded2->chi[k] += d[i]* med* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00074       ded2->a += d[i]*(dX->drho.a[i]* X->Q + med* dX->dQ.a);
00075       ded2->b[i] += d[i]* dX->drho.b* X->Q;
00076       for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00077         ded2->b[k] += d[i]* med* dX->dQ.b[k];
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 static void gcmob_edipole(const dipolepara* d2par,
00083                         const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00084                         const GaussianAux* X,
00085                         gradCM* dCMed2)
00086 {
00087   double* d = d2par->d;
00088   int i;
00089 
00090   if (G1->xi == 1)
00091     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00092       dCMed2->X[i] -= d[i]* X->Q;
00093 }

00095 
00096 #define SQR(x) (x)*(x)
00097 
00098 void calcConstraintED2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00099                        double* ed2)
00100 {
00101   double Xcm[3];
00102   double ed[3], edsq = 0.0;
00103   int i;
00104 
00105   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00106 
00107   OneBodyOperator op_ob_d = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_edipole};
00108 
00109   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_d, ed);
00110 
00111   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00112     edsq += SQR(ed[i]);
00113 
00114   *ed2 = sqrt(edsq);
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 void calcgradConstraintED2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00119                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00120                            gradSlaterDet* ded2)
00121 {
00122   double Xcm[3];
00123   double ed[3], edsq = 0.0;
00124   int i;
00125   dipolepara ed2par;
00126 
00127   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00128 
00129   OneBodyOperator op_ob_d = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_edipole};
00130 
00131   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_d, ed);
00132 
00133   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00134     edsq += SQR(ed[i]);
00135   
00136   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00137     ed2par.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];
00138 
00139   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00140     ed2par.d[i] = ed[i]/sqrt(edsq);
00141 
00142   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_d2 = {opt: 1, par: &ed2par, me: gob_edipole};
00143 
00144   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_d2, ded2);
00145 
00146   OneBodyOperator gcmop_ob_d2 = {dim: 6, opt: 1, par: &ed2par, me: gcmob_edipole};
00147 
00148   calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gcmop_ob_d2, ded2);
00149   ded2->val = sqrt(edsq);
00150 }

00152 
00153 double outputConstraintED2(double val)
00154 {
00155   return val;
00156 }
